name: 40hrs on Americaâ€™s Most Luxurious Train
description:
Try Huel: http://jlinks.io/TrekTrendy

Join me today on America's most luxurious train, in First Class through the incredible Rocky Mountains. I'll be spending 2 days on this brand new USA Rocky Mountaineer train, reviewing all elements of the service from dining, the lounge cars, a seat tour and even the self playing grand piano! We'll be stopping half way in Glenwood Springs for an overnight and then continue on to Utah the next morning. 

Thanks to Rocky Mountaineer for inviting me onboard: https://www.rockymountaineer.com/

0.00 - Introduction 
1.10 - Seat tour
3.30 - Breakfast
4.55 - The Lounge Car
9.02 - Glenwood Springs
11.04 - Day 2
12.26 - Utah
